item.title: HSC Seminar
item.description:
Fall 2023

  • 10/4/23 - Data-centric Architecture Support for Security, Yuanchao Xu (UCSC)

  • 10/18/23 - Challenges and Opportunities to Accelerate ML Inference with Sparsity, Zhibin Xiao (Moffett.AI)

  • 11/1/23 - Reflections on Trusting TrustHUB, Christian Krieg (TU Wien)

  • 11/8/23 - EMISSARY: Enhanced Miss Awareness Replacement Policy for L2 Instruction Caching, Nayana Nagendra (Arm)

  • 11/15/23 - Opportunities and Challenges for In- and Near-Memory Computing for Machine Intelligence, Siddharth Joshi (Notre Dame), @s14joshi

Spring 2023

  • 4/12/23 - Scaling up Server Performance via In-Memory Processing, Jos√© Mart√≠nez (Cornell)

item.title: Publications
item.description:
2024

  • Abel Souza, Kristiaan Pelckmans, Devarshi Ghoshal, Lavanya Ramakrishnan, Johan Tordsson, ASA - The Adaptive Scheduling Algorithm. CoRR abs/2401.09733, 2024.

  • Sreyes Venkatesh, Razvan Marinescu, Jason K. Eshraghian, SQUAT: Stateful Quantization-Aware Training in Recurrent Spiking Neural Networks. CoRR abs/2404.19668, 2024.

  • Rui-Jie Zhu, Yu Zhang, Ethan Sifferman, Tyler Sheaves, Yiqiao Wang 0005, Dustin Richmond, Peng Zhou, Jason K. Eshraghian, Scalable MatMul-free Language Modeling. CoRR abs/2406.02528, 2024.

  • Jinyang Li 0004, Yizhuo Chen, Tomoyoshi Kimura, Tianshi Wang, Ruijie Wang 0004, Denizhan Kara, Yigong Hu, Li Wu, Walid A. Hanafy, Abel Souza, Prashant J. Shenoy, Maggie B. Wigness, Joydeep Bhattacharyya, Jae Kim, Guijun Wang, Greg Kimberly, Josh D. Eckhardt, Denis Osipychev, Tarek F. Abdelzaher, Acies-OS: A Content-Centric Platform for Edge AI Twinning and Orchestration. ICCCN, 1-9, 2024.
